Text: How about ATF Cloud Runner?

Another use for a sandbox instance: Once we have done all the testing and what not on our sandbox and we are ready to do the prod upgrade...before we do We clone our prod to sandbox before the upgrade. This gives us a copy still running on the old version to compare against if we find any production issues. This way we can test was this a problem before the upgrade or not.

So @Blake Molmen , just to be sure: you guys clone PROD to Sandbox, upgrade Sandbox to target version, make tests/fix issues/etc, then when you're ready, re-clone PROD to Sandbox for backup purposes, right?

basically yes... we personally dont do any of the work in sandbox (we use it as a preview before we are ready to start) and fixes are done in the dev pipeline (dev/test).  But yes we re-cone prod down to sandbox before prod as a back up.   then when the hypercare period has calmed down we either clone or upgrade sandbox.
here's a fun one ladies and gentleman, we started our Zurich upgrade. I queued up 279 app updates in App Mgr.

Time: BOLO. I've never seen this before...backup any of your sys_upgrade_history_log entries before you leave for the day.,2,2 Week Upgrades,,,,,Completed,Jade Milano
